name: py-torchbenchmark

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
A collection of open source benchmarks used to evaluate PyTorch
performance.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: git-lfs
dependencies.description:
Git LFS is a system for managing and versioning large files in
association with a Git repository. Instead of storing the large files
within the Git repository as blobs, Git LFS stores special "pointer
files" in the repository, while storing the actual file contents on a
Git LFS server.

dependencies.name: py-torch
dependencies.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.

dependencies.name: py-torchaudio
dependencies.description: An audio package for PyTorch.

dependencies.name: py-torchtext
dependencies.description: Text utilities, models, transforms, and datasets for PyTorch.

dependencies.name: py-torchvision
dependencies.description: Image and video datasets and models for torch deep learning.

dependencies.name: py-accelerate
dependencies.description:
A simple way to train and use PyTorch models with multi-GPU, TPU, mixed-
precision.

dependencies.name: py-beautifulsoup4
dependencies.description:
Beautiful Soup is a Python library for pulling data out of HTML and XML
files. It works with your favorite parser to provide idiomatic ways of
navigating, searching, and modifying the parse tree.

dependencies.name: py-patch
dependencies.description: Library to parse and apply unified diffs.

dependencies.name: py-py-cpuinfo
dependencies.description: Get CPU info with pure Python 2 & 3

dependencies.name: py-distro
dependencies.description: Distro - an OS platform information API.

dependencies.name: py-iopath
dependencies.description: A library for providing I/O abstraction.

dependencies.name: py-pytest
dependencies.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependencies.name: py-pytest-benchmark
dependencies.description: A pytest fixture for benchmarking code.

dependencies.name: py-requests
dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependencies.name: py-tabulate
dependencies.description: Pretty-print tabular data

dependencies.name: py-timm
dependencies.description: (Unofficial) PyTorch Image Models.

dependencies.name: py-transformers
dependencies.description:
State-of-the-art Natural Language Processing for TensorFlow 2.0 and
PyTorch

dependencies.name: py-monkeytype
dependencies.description: Generating type annotations from sampled production types.

dependencies.name: py-psutil
dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-kornia
dependencies.description: Open Source Differentiable Computer Vision Library for PyTorch.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description:
SciPy (pronounced "Sigh Pie") is a Scientific Library for Python. It
provides many user-friendly and efficient numerical routines such as
routines for numerical integration and optimization.

dependencies.name: py-submitit
dependencies.description: Python toolbox for submitting jobs to Slurm.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
